title: Which are the best free online coaching classes for IIT JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: OK you are preparing for IIT JEE, and you want to learn its whole syllabus with a good teacher for free of cost. Actually there is no any specific platform available, which can give you full JEE syllabus lecture for JEE. But you can complete your different subject on different platform. First Come with physics There is a website known as Online Physics Video Lectures, Classes and Courses , run by Ashish Arora sir. He is HOD of physics in ALLEN Jaipur, and guru of AIR-1 ( Aman goyal), AIR-3 and many more. You can read about him on his website, where he teaches physics for JEE students. Now but the problem is that everyone do not know how to use his lecture. But I will tell you. first go to his website  Then select physics grade- 11&12  Then select section and topics  After that this will come to your screen   Select the topic that you want to learn ( say motion in 1d)  And in between lecture, question set is also given  After finishing your topic you can go for it's advance questions  And then after finishing all these things you can go for your chapter test    You can also download your notes of higher concepts   Now Comes for Inorganic chemistry Download unacadmey app and there search Megha Khandelwal  Here you can study your whole Inorganic chemistry for JEE advance For Organic chemistry also You can learn IUPAC name, GOC , Isomerism and reaction mechanism by Megha Khandelwal, and then rest of the chapter you learn by Sachin Rana. Here is his unacadmy profile  And his courses        For class 12 physical chemistry go to Arvind Arora's YouTube channel   And for class 11 physical chemistry , you can learn from him on unacadmy. Here is his profile  Now for Math Go to YouTube and search Mohit Tayagi  Here is about him  And order of his videos is  And for regular contact with your subjects subscribe these youtube channels Sachin Rana 2. Chemistry enthusiasts  3. Kalpit veerwal  4. Vedantu  5. Mathongo ( study sequence and series from him)  6. Physics Galaxy  7. Blackpenredpen ( Calculas expert)  8. The Lighthouse  9. IItian explains  Now, A question comes, what to do for questions practice? So for physics you can go for these books  For math  For chemistry  Note:- Don't go for too many booksAlways make a short notes of each cahpter ( short notes mean short i.e maxmum two page for a cahpter)If you want to learn a chapter on YouTube then first download it, and after that turn off your data connection and then start watching lectures. It will helps you to avoiding distraction from YouTube recommendations video. Or you can make a separate YouTube account in which you will only watch lectures or video related IIT JEE.Stop wasting time on motivating videos.Revise short notes at least once in a week.Don't make routine, make Targets that today I will finish these topic’s numericals or conceptsDon't ignore NCERT, specially for chemistryDo yoga or excersice daily.Drink sufficient water daily to balance body temperature and to avoid headache and laziness during study.Avoid late night studyGo to bed before 12:00 AmBEST OF LUCK

Free coaching is not the thing you should go with because they are in such an unorganized manner that will only waste your time. So pay a little and try to save your carrier and time as online coaching worth paying them. As they are not so much costly as compared to the offline coaching at your city. Online Coaching are the best way to save your time for the preparations of IIT-JEE, as they give you flexibility with the timings and your study syllabus. It gives you knowledge with comfort. As these coaching provide the video lectures of some best teachers they have, knowledge and concepts become easier to grasp there. Its fun learning from them. You can repeat the number of chapters or the topics with these lectures, that can comfort our learning of the harder topics. So there is some of your comfortable companions which can help you out: 1)Bi Ju’s 2)Etoos India 3)Kaysons Educations 4)Embibe There are some more coaching among which you can choose, where the choice lies in your hand. So choose wisely….. I personally chose Kaysons Educations for my prep in my class 12th,because I was lagging behind in my coaching at my city due to my regular illness for 3 months. So I searched for my options and came up with it, because it has lots of benefits over others.. RESULTS:- The main factor to choose a coaching are its results, this was also my first priority, so I checked out for coaching and found its results very satisfying.  These were a much satisfying numbers to opt for it. PREPARATION STRATEGY: -Then it came about the strategy of preparation i.e. number of hours of lectures, course content in it, and their teachers. I found it from their website, as they have a very good interface at their websites. The thing that fascinates me most that they give you lectures which you can look through for number of times you want. DOUBT CLEARING:- As the main fear of the students opting for online courses is that how they will clear the doubts they will encounter with. So I searched for it too on their website and got satisfying assurance from it. TEACHERS:- Later the major factor comes in mind is of teachers which i think they have ample amount of good teachers and problem solving(doubt solving) assistants too.TEST SERIES:- One of the last things that come in mind is of practicing your ability and testing it, so lately we get concerns about test series, which i think they have arranged well too. Have a better look for it from their website.At last I found worth taking online coaching, I deeply suggest it over local offline coaching, go for it if you can’t reach Kota or any renowned city for prep. I am not telling you to join only Kaysons, you should be open to all, compare all of them and choose for the best. I hope you can take up with my experience. Hope best for you. ALL the best for your preparations then…..
